title: cant see support ticket
body: someone stole my account and i wrote ticket but i cant see that http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/23525633. it said page you were looking for doesnt exist.

replies.body: In this case, the url isn't working because there's a period in it but I'm assuming that's not the inherent issue.  You need to be logged in in order to see that ticket.  If you've lost access in order to do that, you can also send us an email to support@riotgames.com.  In the meantime, the current ticket was escalated to our account team and you should receive an email notification in case you can't access it through the ticketing support site.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
